video.title: Parks and Recreation
video.synopsis: In this Emmy-nominated comedy, an employee with a rural Parks and Recreation department is full of energy and ideas but bogged down by bureaucracy.

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to beautify her town, Leslie Knope takes on what should be a fairly simple project: help turn an abandoned construction pit into a park.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and her committee go door-to-door to build support for her park project, but things don't go smoothly. Tom uses dubious recruiting tactics.
episodes.title: Canvassing

episodes.synopsis: While being interviewed about her park project, Leslie has trouble staying on message, and Mark only makes things worse. Tom kisses up to his boss.
episodes.title: The Reporter

episodes.synopsis: Leslie tries to make her way into the old boys' club of politics but quickly faces a tough ethical choice. Andy has a secret plan to surprise Ann.
episodes.title: Boys' Club

episodes.synopsis: Leslie attends a banquet and discovers what it takes to get what you want in the political arena. Tom and Mark go to a bar and pick up some women.
episodes.title: The Banquet

episodes.synopsis: Leslie attends an important meeting with a local bigwig while her subcommittee members go to Andy's first concert since breaking his legs.
episodes.title: Rock Show

episodes.synopsis: When Leslie decides to marry two penguins, both turn out to be male. Mark puts Ann in an awkward situation when he asks her to go see a movie.
episodes.title: Pawnee Zoo

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and Tom discover someone planted marijuana in the new community garden. Hoping to catch those responsible, they pull an all-night stakeout.
episodes.title: The Stakeout

episodes.synopsis: Leslie looks forward to picking a new Miss Pawnee, but her opinions conflict with the other judges. Ann learns that Andy has been living in the pit.
episodes.title: Beauty Pageant

episodes.synopsis: Ann takes Leslie on a practice date. After a local councilman's sex scandal, Tom, Ron, April and Mark see who can uncover the most dirt on each other.
episodes.title: Practice Date

episodes.synopsis: Leslie hosts the parks department from Venezuela and is shocked at the cultural differences. Tom becomes an errand boy. April plays hard to get.
episodes.title: Sister City

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and the department volunteer to help build a playground for a neighboring town. Leslie is frustrated at the lack of progress with the pit.
episodes.title: Kaboom

episodes.synopsis: Leslie gets help from Dave and Andy in order to catch a vandal. Struggling to make her Halloween party fun, Ann gets help from an unlikely source.
episodes.title: Greg Pikitis

episodes.synopsis: Leslie learns that the library department wants to take over her lot. The library is run by Ron's ex-wife, who still has an emotional hold on him.
episodes.title: Ron and Tammy

episodes.synopsis: After a mural in City Hall is defaced, Leslie and the department compete to come up with a new design. Andy and Ron share an uncomfortable moment.
episodes.title: The Camel

episodes.synopsis: Leslie invites herself on Ron's annual hunting trip, but things don't go as planned. April and Andy bond in the office while everyone is away.
episodes.title: Hunting Trip

episodes.synopsis: Leslie sees Tom and Wendy at divorce court. Leslie takes Tom out on the town so he can forget his sadness. Tom has an epiphany about his marriage.
episodes.title: Tom's Divorce

episodes.synopsis: Leslie has to hide from the press when a meeting with a disgraced councilman lands her in the middle of a sex scandal. Ron offers to cover for Leslie.
episodes.title: Christmas Scandal

episodes.synopsis: Ann sets Leslie up on a blind date with a co-worker, but it doesn't go as well as Leslie hoped. An old friend of Ann's makes Mark feel insecure.
episodes.title: The Set-Up

episodes.synopsis: After a great date with Justin in Indianapolis, Leslie tries to impress him with a dinner party at her house. Tom's upset that Leslie invited Wendy.
episodes.title: Leslie's House

episodes.synopsis: The Parks Department forms a partnership to sell energy bars, but Leslie discovers how unhealthy the snacks are. Mark agrees to help Tom move out.
episodes.title: Sweetums

episodes.synopsis: Leslie reunites her mom with an old flame on Valentine's Day. Meanwhile, Andy and his band are nervous about playing at the Senior Center.
episodes.title: Galentine's Day

episodes.synopsis: Leslie is outraged when Ron wins a "Woman of the Year" award for a project she started. Tom tries to find some money to invest in a local nightclub.
episodes.title: Woman of the Year

episodes.synopsis: When a possum bites the mayor's dog, Leslie is asked to catch the pesky animal. Meanwhile, Ron is upset when Mark refuses to bend the rules for him.
episodes.title: The Possum

episodes.synopsis: After Jerry gets mugged, Leslie meets with the park ranger in hopes of improving park safety. Everyone tries to be nicer to Jerry once he returns.
episodes.title: Park Safety

episodes.synopsis: Leslie takes Ron and the past directors out for a picnic lunch. Tom asks Ann and Mark to pose for the cover photo of the summer events catalog.
episodes.title: Summer Catalog

episodes.synopsis: Ron is furious when April mistakenly schedules a ton of meetings for him. Meanwhile, Leslie fights to preserve a historical landmark.
episodes.title: 94 Meetings

episodes.synopsis: Leslie hosts a local telethon and gets former Indiana Pacer Detlef Schrempf as a celebrity guest. Mark has big plans for his relationship with Ann.
episodes.title: Telethon

episodes.synopsis: Leslie's new park plans are put on hold by a visit from two state auditors. April has plans for Andy. Ann tries to piece together a romantic mystery.
episodes.title: The Master Plan

episodes.synopsis: Ben prevents Leslie from holding a children's concert. Mark makes some big decisions. Andy gets some unexpected romantic attention.
episodes.title: Freddy Spaghetti

episodes.synopsis: Leslie tries to convince Chris and Ben to give the parks department more money, and when she fails to persuade them, she enlists Ann's help.
episodes.title: Go Big or Go Home

episodes.synopsis: While planning for the local Harvest Festival, Leslie is struck with the flu and is forced to go to the hospital. April's an annoying patient for Ann.
episodes.title: Flu Season

episodes.synopsis: Leslie wants to bury a time capsule that encapsulates life in Pawnee, but an odd suggestion from a local man causes unforeseen consequences.
episodes.title: Time Capsule

episodes.synopsis: Tom tries to get back at Ron by going out on a date with Ron's ex-wife, Tammy, while Leslie tries to protect Ron from falling prey to her charms.
episodes.title: Ron and Tammy: Part II

episodes.synopsis: Trying to get the word out about the Harvest Festival, Leslie, Ben and Tom do radio, TV and newspaper interviews. Ben is teased about his past.
episodes.title: Media Blitz

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and Ron drive to Indianapolis to receive commendation for the upcoming Pawnee Harvest Festival. Tom pitches a cologne to a fragrance mogul.
episodes.title: Indianapolis

episodes.synopsis: With the fate of her entire department hinging on the success of the Harvest Festival, Leslie deals with last-minute problems.
episodes.title: Harvest Festival

episodes.synopsis: Leslie takes the whole department camping in order to brainstorm new ideas. Meanwhile, Andy attempts a romantic gesture for April.
episodes.title: Camping

episodes.synopsis: Andy and April host a dinner party for all their friends. Ben asks Leslie for some career advice, while Ann tries her luck at a singles party.
episodes.title: Andy and April's Fancy Party

episodes.synopsis: Ann convinces Leslie to join an online dating service, only to be matched with someone she already knows. Chris tries to ban meat from City Hall.
episodes.title: Soulmates

episodes.synopsis: Jerry's contribution to Leslie's community art show causes a stir. Ben moves in with April and Andy and attempts to teach them how to be adults.
episodes.title: Jerry's Painting

episodes.synopsis: When the neighboring city of Eagleton puts up a fence around one of their parks, Leslie must convice her former best friend to take it down.
episodes.title: Eagleton

episodes.synopsis: When Leslie tries to get Ann a job at city hall, her lukewarm reaction causes their first-ever fight. Tom hosts a big party at the Snakehole Lounge.
episodes.title: The Fight

episodes.synopsis: When Chris sends Leslie and Ben on a trip to Indianapolis, Leslie is afraid she won't be able to deny her feelings for him.
episodes.title: Road Trip

episodes.synopsis: Everyone in the office is unhappy when Chris decides to make some big changes in the parks department -- especially Tom. Ron pushes back on Chris.
episodes.title: The Bubble

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and the parks team put together a memorial service for a dearly departed friend. Meanwhile, Tom makes a big life decision.
episodes.title: Li'l Sebastian

episodes.synopsis: Leslie has to either break up with Ben or follow her dream of running for office. Ron prepares for the return of his first ex-wife, Tammy One.
episodes.title: I'm Leslie Knope

episodes.synopsis: Leslie intervenes when Tammy One begins controlling Ron's every move. Ben tries to help Tom balance the books, while Ann makes a PSA starring Chris.
episodes.title: Ron and Tammys

episodes.synopsis: While promoting her new book about Pawnee, Leslie falls prey to some "gotcha" journalism. Meanwhile, Ann is determined to bond with Ron and April.
episodes.title: Born & Raised

episodes.synopsis: To fight the inequality of Ron's boys-only wilderness group, Leslie takes her girls-only troop, the Pawnee Goddesses, on an adventure weekend.
episodes.title: Pawnee Rangers

episodes.synopsis: Ben is mad when Andy and April decide to throw a Halloween party at their house without asking him. Tom emcees an event for Leslie's campaign.
episodes.title: Meet 'n' Greet

episodes.synopsis: A local Pawnee group predicts that the end of the world is approaching, causing Leslie and the others to contemplate their lives.
episodes.title: End of the World

episodes.synopsis: Leslie enlists Ben, Andy and April to host a Model U.N. for Pawnee Central High School. Chris asks Ann for advice when a date cancels on him.
episodes.title: The Treaty

episodes.synopsis: Leslie uses her new tourist attraction as a way to spend more time with Ben. Meanwhile, Ron and April encourage Andy to go to college.
episodes.title: Smallest Park

episodes.synopsis: When Leslie and Ben make their relationship known, Chris must launch an ethics investigation and trial against the couple.
episodes.title: The Trial of Leslie Knope

episodes.synopsis: Unable to get work done from inside the Parks Department, Leslie forms a citizen action group and fights from the outside.
episodes.title: Citizen Knope

episodes.synopsis: Leslie enlists everyone's help in staging an attention-getting event. Ben explores a new hobby, while April and Andy adopt a pet.
episodes.title: The Comeback Kid

episodes.synopsis: Faced with a tough opponent, Leslie and Ben disagree on the content of her first campaign ad. Ron is uncomfortable when Chris tries to befriend him.
episodes.title: Campaign Ad

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and Ben throw a bowling party after hearing focus group feedback. April, Chris, Donna and Jerry try to raise money by cold calling.
episodes.title: Bowling for Votes

episodes.synopsis: Leslie decides she needs to find Ann a new man. Ben must enlist Ron's help when he is stumped by Leslie's elaborate Valentine's Day scavenger hunt.
episodes.title: Operation Ann

episodes.synopsis: While trying to get an endorsement from the Chief of Police, Leslie and Ben run into Leslie's ex. Meanwhile, Andy works on a campaign theme song.
episodes.title: Dave Returns

episodes.synopsis: Leslie realizes that the department has forgotten Jerry's birthday and decides to throw a party for him at a special location.
episodes.title: Sweet Sixteen

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and Ben are caught off guard when her opponent hires a campaign manager from Washington. Chris forces Ron to interview replacements for Leslie.
episodes.title: Campaign Shake-Up

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and Ben are thrilled when a talk show host wants to interview Leslie. April and Ron prep Andy for his final exam in his women's studies course.
episodes.title: Lucky

episodes.synopsis: When Leslie finds out the that the department's budget is about to be cut, she convinces Councilman Pillner to make the cuts elsewhere.
episodes.title: Live Ammo

episodes.synopsis: Leslie faces off with Bobby Newport in a televised debate. Ann, Tom and Chris work the media spin room, while Ron saves a party for Leslie's donors.
episodes.title: The Debate

episodes.synopsis: Leslie goes on a bus tour for the final day of her campaign, and is caught off guard when an important person in Pawnee passes away.
episodes.title: Bus Tour

episodes.synopsis: It's election day in Pawnee, and only a razor-thin margin divides Leslie and Bobby Newport. Everyone waits with Leslie for the race to be called.
episodes.title: Win, Lose, or Draw

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and Andy visit Ben and April in Washington, D.C. Ron throws Pawnee's employee appreciation barbecue, but it's not the same without Leslie.
episodes.title: Ms. Knope Goes to Washington

episodes.synopsis: Leslie fights obesity in Pawnee with a new soda tax. Andy trains to get into the police academy. Ben has trouble getting respect from his interns.
episodes.title: Soda Tax

episodes.synopsis: Leslie helps her swim team get more time in the community pool. Ron helps a resident fix a pothole. Ben and April get stranded on a road trip.
episodes.title: How a Bill Becomes a Law

episodes.synopsis: Leslie tries her hand at teaching a sex-education class after an STD outbreak. Ron attempts to show Tom how to enjoy life without technology.
episodes.title: Sex Education

episodes.synopsis: Leslie's Halloween spirit disappears when she receives some bad news from Ben. Ron and Andy take Diane's children trick-or-treating.
episodes.title: Halloween Surprise

episodes.synopsis: An apprehensive Leslie meets Ben's parents for the first time. Tom starts to lose patience with Jean-Ralphio. Chris is an emotional wreck.
episodes.title: Ben's Parents

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and April fight about a dog park, until Jamm threatens both of their plans. Ben helps Tom promote Rent-A-Swag. Andy investigates a robbery.
episodes.title: Leslie vs. April

episodes.synopsis: Leslie appeals to the public for park suggestions, but bristles when the best design comes from an Eagletonian. Chris learns wood carving from Ron.
episodes.title: Pawnee Commons

episodes.synopsis: As Ron accepts a woodworking award, Diane feels threatened by another woman in his life. Jerry shows off his beautiful family at a Christmas party.
episodes.title: Ron and Diane

episodes.synopsis: Ann plans the perfect bachelorette party for Leslie, while Chris throws a bachelor blast for Ben. Councilman Jamm tries to interfere.
episodes.title: Two Parties

episodes.synopsis: Leslie focuses on women's equality in government by becoming a garbage collector for a day with Ann. Tom wants to learn how to play basketball.
episodes.title: Women in Garbage

episodes.synopsis: A series of failed relationships prompts Ann to make a dramatic decision. Ben, Chris and Ron get horrible food poisoning.
episodes.title: Ann's Decision

episodes.synopsis: Leslie is forced to participate in an emergency-response drill instead of preparing for her fundraising gala. Ben has a spontaneous idea.
episodes.title: Emergency Response

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and Ben have two hours to complete a yearlong project. Meanwhile, Ron lands in trouble when his temper gets the better of him.
episodes.title: Leslie and Ben

episodes.synopsis: Leslie is literally left speechless when someone steals her planned address for a big media event. Ben is overwhelmed by his new job.
episodes.title: Correspondents' Lunch

episodes.synopsis: Leslie tries to save a neighborhood video store, but is embarrassed when the store makes big changes. Tom hires Jean-Ralphio's kooky sister.
episodes.title: Bailout

episodes.synopsis: Ben travels back to his Minnesota hometown to make amends. Ann and Chris worry about their compatibility. Jamm sues Ron for punching him in the face.
episodes.title: Partridge

episodes.synopsis: Leslie takes charge of the stoner-run animal control department. Ron resists medical treament from Ann. Ben and Andy seek help from Dennis Feinstein.
episodes.title: Animal Control

episodes.synopsis: Leslie fights to eliminate outdated laws, but meets resistance from an odd history buff. Ann and Ben can't keep up with Leslie's gift-giving calendar.
episodes.title: Article Two

episodes.synopsis: Leslie tries to commemorate Jerry's retirement, but realizes there's more to life than work. The office picks a "new Jerry" to be the butt of jokes.
episodes.title: Jerry's Retirement

episodes.synopsis: Leslie tries to persuade Jamm to save the miniature golf park. Andy finds out Mouse Rat is playing shows without him. Tom can't handle Mona-Lisa.
episodes.title: Swing Vote

episodes.synopsis: Leslie celebrates her first year as a city councilwoman. Tom fields an offer to buy Rent-A-Swag. April and Diane each deliver surprising news.
episodes.title: Are You Better Off?

episodes.synopsis: When Diane reveals she's pregnant, Ron proposes and they get married at the office. Meanwhile, an award sends Leslie and some of the staff to London.
episodes.title: London: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Leslie, Ben and Chris visit Eagleton to discuss financial matters; Ann takes April to her vet school orientation; Ron tries to erase his identity.
episodes.title: The Pawnee-Eagleton Tip Off Classic

episodes.synopsis: Leslie tries to unite the Pawnee and Eagleton departments, with disastrous results; Ann breaks the news that she and Chris are moving to Michigan.
episodes.title: Doppelgängers

episodes.synopsis: Leslie does damage control when Donna inadvertently sends out a racy message via the department's Twitter account; Ron drafts his will.
episodes.title: Gin It Up!

episodes.synopsis: Leslie throws Ben a '90s-themed birthday bash but ends up missing it for a filibuster; Andy returns from London, if only for a while.
episodes.title: Filibuster

episodes.synopsis: Leslie spends the day of the recall vote planning for Halloween celebrations; Ron gives Tom advice on selling his business.
episodes.title: Recall Vote

episodes.synopsis: Leslie comes to terms with being recalled, but her lame-duck fight to add fluoride to Pawnee's drinking water sets off a series of disasters.
episodes.title: Fluoride

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and Councilman Jamm clash over a park proposal; Ben gets a hobby, then a job; Tom, April and Donna help Ron sell his cabin.
episodes.title: The Cones of Dunshire

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of yet another Councilman Dexhart scandal, Leslie, facing her last days in office, announces her plans to run for city council.
episodes.title: Second Chunce

episodes.synopsis: Leslie returns to her old job, and Ben replaces Chris as city manager. Meanwhile, Andy and April pull a series of pranks on Ben.
episodes.title: New Beginnings

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and Ben clash over the handling of the new farmers market; Ann's pregnancy starts to get on everyone's nerves.
episodes.title: Farmers Market

episodes.synopsis: Leslie throws Ann and Chris a going-away party and attempts to fulfill a promise to Ann; the guys try to find the perfect goodbye gift for Chris.
episodes.title: Ann and Chris

episodes.synopsis: Ben's attempt to surprise Leslie with gifts for their anniversary backfires; Andy and Tom plan a concert celebrating the Pawnee-Eagleton merger.
episodes.title: Anniversaries

episodes.synopsis: Leslie's destruction of the wall between Pawnee and Eagleton unleashes a horde of bees; Ron fixes an abandoned Town Hall floor; Diane gives birth.
episodes.title: The Wall

episodes.synopsis: A contest for a new town slogan turns into a morass of obscenity; April and Donna try to sabotage Tom's restaurant plans to get him to stay.
episodes.title: New Slogan

episodes.synopsis: Leslie plans a "Galentine's Day" brunch in hopes of finding a new best friend, and visits Ann and new baby Oliver.
episodes.title: Galentine's Day

episodes.synopsis: Leslie reinstates the senior prom, which had been a victim of budget cuts, and hires Ben and Tom as DJs. Andy tries to get April to go with him.
episodes.title: Prom

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and Andy plan a concert while fighting the flu; Donna, Tom and April sample wines for Tom's new restaurant.
episodes.title: Flu Season 2

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and Ben attempt to keep her pregnancy a secret. Meanwhile, Ron helps Donna deal with her ex-boyfriend.
episodes.title: One in 8,000

episodes.synopsis: Leslie, Ben and Andy travel to San Francisco; Tom's restaurant suffers a disastrous opening night; the Parks Department presents the Unity Concert.
episodes.title: Moving Up
